item.title: Getting started
item.description: Quickstart The easiest way to get started is using Docker Compose to start with minimal requirements.

item.title: Getting started with Tests
item.description: Getting started (continue) with Tests Now that you have finished the Getting started guide, you should have a Microcks installation up-and-running and filled with some samples from the Microcks repository.
